title: DDOS ???!{{item:3070}}{{item:3070}}{{item:3070}}

replies.body: It sounds like you might have had a connection hiccup or instability that caused you to lose connection to the game and other services.  The servers have been fine, so I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot any instability just in case.  Hopefully everything is okay now!
